Package cse3063f19p1_abinay_myayin_aaltay.game.square

Class LotSquare

  • java.lang.Object
    • cse3063f19p1_abinay_myayin_aaltay.game.square.Square
      • cse3063f19p1_abinay_myayin_aaltay.game.square.PropertySquare
        • cse3063f19p1_abinay_myayin_aaltay.game.square.LotSquare
  • public class LotSquare
extends PropertySquare
    Lot Square represents Lot Square from Monopoly Game. Players can buy Lots and when they have all the colored lot group they can build houses on it up to 4 houses after building 4 homes players can build hotels.

    • Field Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getRent

        public int getRent()
        Gets the rent. If owner of the square owns all the colored lot group, amount of rent is multiplied by 2 and If there are houses or hotels build on the lot, base rent price will be multiplied by a building coefficient
        Specified by:
